title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush (Model HX3681/24) – Easy, gentle, and effective.

- What it does: Cleans your teeth up to 3 times better than a manual toothbrush. Helps remove plaque and protect your gums.
- How it feels: Slim, light handle with a familiar-shaped brush head. Comfortable to hold and easy to guide.

Simple features that help you every day:
- Two-minute timer: The brush gently guides you to brush for the dentist-recommended 2 minutes.
- QuadPacer reminders: A small pause lets you know when it’s time to move to the next part of your mouth, so you don’t miss any spots.
- Gentle pressure alert: If you press too hard, a red light flashes to remind you to be gentle, helping prevent sore gums.
- Two cleaning strengths: Choose a lower or higher setting, whichever feels best for you.

What’s in the box:
- 1 Philips Sonicare 4100 rechargeable toothbrush handle.
- 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head.
- 1 USB charger. Note: A wall plug is not included. You can plug the USB into a computer, a USB wall plug you already have, or a USB outlet.

Easy to use:
1) Charge the brush with the USB cable before first use.
2) Pop on the brush head.
3) Press the power button to start. Use for 2 minutes until it stops.
4) Rinse the brush head after use and let it air dry.

Good to know:
- Color: Black.
- Safe for crowns, fillings, and implants when used as directed.
- Replace the brush head about every 3 months, or sooner if the bristles look worn.

If you want a toothbrush that is gentle on gums, simple to use, and helps you clean better with less effort, the Philips Sonicare 4100 is a great choice.
